page.title: 16Employment
page.content: There are 282 children in our school the percentage of the childrens parents who work in our block is 24.11%. The results were that only four out of every hundred people work in our block.Most people{commute}to Dundee to work. There are 23{shops}in Tayport 97 people are employed by them which gives an average of 4 people to each shop. There are 4 working{Factories}in Tayport;Foodmek,which makes food machinery and employs 30 people. Maplin's a print works,which employs 11 people. Scott and Fyffe who make polypropylene and employ over 200 people. Abertay works,which makes agricultural buildings, and employs 12 people.Cont'
